story: Finley the trout lived in a sparkly stream surrounded by fluffy green moss and towering trees. She loved to swim upstream, chasing after shiny stones and giggling at the way the sunlight danced on the water. One day, a group of curious children came to visit the stream, laughing and splashing in the shallow waters. Finley swam up to say hello, and the kids oohed and ahhed at her shimmering scales. As they played together, Finley realized that life was a fin-tastic adventure, full of new friends and hidden treasures. And she couldn't wait to explore more of the stream with her new buddies!
